Articles.Content: I'm really lost on this. I need to move a great amount of kerbals(16) from a crashed MK3 passenger module to a new, not-crashed plane. Is there any mods to control multiple kerbals at once? I lose patience easily when it comes to extravehicular activities...

How about placing a klaw in the rescue vehicle? You "dock" by inserting the claw in the crashed module and then you transfer the kerbals by clicking in the scape hatch. You'll still have to do it one by one, but you won't need to do any EVA

Thanks! that actually worked! But there was a mod for multiple kerbal movement, but Thanks! I wanted the mod though...

Edited January 18, 2015 by greenbow66
